extension.summary: Find and resolve media from a url to play or open.
extension.description:
PlayThis will attempt to find and resolve* media from a url to play or open. A history list is available for future use/exporting to M3U**. Supports video, audio and images. * resolves using URLResolver and youtube-dl ** M3U only usable in Kodi w/ PlayThis installed
Companion browser extension available on the Chrome Web Store and Mozilla's AMO Gallery
